description: This is the most recent update, showing current changes and status.
Introduced new features and improvements based on user feedback.
Refined the home page content to be more engaging and humorous for users. Updated endpoint explanations to be straightforward and simple.
Added security enhancements using Helmet middleware to protect against common vulnerabilities. Implemented a custom 404 error handler for better user experience when accessing unknown routes.

In this latest refinement, we have meticulously improved our documentation to offer clarity befitting of a well-bred gentleman's discourse. Should you find earlier updates absent, it is by design, to conserve precious server space as per the most prudent measures of our time.
